nodes.text: Torn Station was a space station located in a star system within the Mytaranor sector. The sector was part of the Kashyyyk Region in the Slice section of the Mid Rim. The station was connected to the Kashyyyk and Quas Killam systems through the hyperlane known as the Great Kashyyyk Branch.

Torn Station served as a refueling stop amidst the asteroids and comets rolling through the surrounding star system. Underworld groups such as slavers, pirates, and smugglers controlled hideouts on the station.
Torn Station was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the station in the grid square P-10.
